content.text:
# 10th Golden Horse Awards

The 10th Golden Horse Awards () took place on October 30, 1972, at Zhongshan Hall in Taipei, Taiwan.
Winners and nominees
Winners are listed first, highlighted in boldface.
{| class=wikitable
|-
| valign="top" width="50%"|
* Execution in Autumn
**Indebted for Life and Love (runner-up)
**Fist of Fury (runner-up)
**Love Can Forgive and Forget (runner-up)
**The French Line (runner-up)
**The Water Margin (runner-up)
| valign="top" width="50%"|
*Jiu Ye Zhi Lu (runner-up)
*Feng Yu Sheng Xin Xin (runner-up)
*Harvest (runner-up)
*Frogman (runner-up)
|-
